messages.subject: For the Male members of the group
messages.msgSnippet: I made up a little Thank You page for the gentlemen of the list who have put up with our fundoshi fangirl moments and who have so kindly translated the
messages.messageBody:
I made up a little "Thank You" page for the gentlemen of the list who
have put up with our fundoshi fangirl moments and who have so kindly
translated the fish's babbling and shared their knowledge of all things
Shinsengumi

Gentlemen, this one's for you:


http://www.shinsengumihq.com/Thanks.htm


Barb Sheridan
